item.title: Discover Weekly
item.description: Copy excel data straight into R dataframes Quicker than quick…Copy data in excel and straight into an R dataframe! I won’t need this data ever again, so why bother saving and loading a file? read.table(file = "clipboard" , sep = "\t" , header = TRUE) EDA Part 1: Data Summarization Usually, I use DataExplorer package for EDA. It produces a nice HTML file containing the EDA. ´create_report function´ Data Summarization - Character table() convert factor or character data (categorical data) into counts.

item.title: Useful Packages
item.description: Simplifying The Art Of Missing Values With simputation Your data has ton of missing values. Imputation is critical for this real-world data set but dealing with missing values can be challenging. Should you just remove the data? Should you interpolate? Should you apply a complex algorithm? R package simputation aggregates and simplifies the process of applying imputation techniques from various popular packages. More information here : Getting started with simputation

item.title: About
item.description: I used to be a QI geophysicist in the oil industry but decided to go back and start at the bottom of the ladder again to become a data scientist.
